attributes.review:

attributes.title: Zero stars!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because the cheeto in the bunker is trying to get a second turn on the Xbox even though momma Washington told him he was grounded. But when I opened the app, all I saw was hate speech and a racist pig with a spray tan trying to convince the far-wrong that their preschool school level of thinking was correct, which is a lie and a joke, just like this entire app. Please remove it from the app store, it has keyed my car, stolen my dog and had “intimate intercourse” with my wife.
attributes.title: Absolutely APPALLING 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review:
The poop song
I feel it... I feel it... I feel it! I know what to do, when im about to poo, i go to the potty pull my underpants down. And I sit and wait, I sit and wait, I sit and wait, I sit and wait until the poop plops out! Then I wipe and wipe till brown leaves town, put it in the potty and flush it down! Bye bye poop! Bye bye poop! Then i pull up my pants, wash my hands, wash my hands then do the potty dance! Yay you did it!
attributes.title: 🧚🏻✨WISH I COULD RATE 0/10🧚🏻✨

attributes.review: It’s not Donald Trump’s fault this app is GARBAGE!!!!! First, this took up SO MUCH space on my phone! Once I downloaded this, even though my phone is brand new, my phone starting turning off prematurely and whenever I open the app my phone crashes and I have to reset it. It’s happened 17 times!!! Not to mention when I can finally get the app to work, its extremely difficult to navigate. They’ve made it very difficult to understand how I am supposed to reserve tickets for me and my family at Mr. Trumps events and for his live appearances. Who ever made this app is doing President Trump an injustice. We should not stand for this quality of craftsmanship. Take this app off the app store immediately!!! Trump should have the best quality app on any apple device EVER. -1000/10.
attributes.title: Wish I could put 0

attributes.review: I have $91378 saved for my college application and then all of it got wiped away by this app all of my money gone 😪😪😪😪😪 it also sold my house and I’m living in the street using my neighbors WiFi. It also wiped my data and backups and sold my green card and it put me on the wanted list for 1 million dead or alive i here gunshots near me I’ll brb! 😭😭😭😭😭

attributes.review: So, I was going on a walk with peppa pig tehe 🐷and then I 🧚🏼‍♀️✨𝑠𝑖𝑠𝑡𝑒𝑟 𝑑𝑜𝑤𝑛𝑙𝑜𝑎𝑑𝑒𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝✨🧚🏼‍♀️ and all of the sudden my storage got filled up 😙✌️ and then I went to go check my storage. And it downloaded a whole bunch of 😉 Dancing oranges, and bananas. I was so confused and mad!! 🤞😾then I went home thinking nothing of it. I went to go pet my pet TRUMP SUPPORTING house.😺and then I got really shy👉🏻👈🏻 Iᗰ ᗩ ᔕᕼY ᗷOI🥴 and i saw peppa looking over me. She wanted to walk our pet fly. So we did. Then peppa disappeared out of thin air 😌 then I went online and found some pictures of peppa stuck in the ground. Then holy water splashed in my face 💦 then Jesus broke into my house 😁 and said “hey, homie. Give me all of your money” I happily gave him my 69 cents. He through me on a cross and nailed screws in me. It was the shape of a Lenny face ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) then i awoke from my 12 hour death nap 😜 i felt so fresh 😻 “r-r-r roll up to the party with my crazy pink wig, but get through to door. Cause my bootys to big~ 1% is human 99 is plastic. Just a sec I gotta fix my lips.” Then I r-r-r rolled up to the party and found the one and only 🐷🐽 𝚙𝚎𝚙𝚙𝚊 𝚙𝚒𝚐 🐽🐷 I saved my dog and then l-l-l left the party. I hope my review helped you! Goodbye!
attributes.title: THIS APP RAPED PEPPA PIG
attributes.userName: i love my dog named stormy

attributes.review: This app is incredibly difficult to use. The features are full of bugs and links are broken. I don’t know what fiverr contractor they paid to code this, but it’s awful. Some of the info even seems to be wrong. Plus, it asks for an awfull lot of private information. Something about it seems suspicious. I hope it’s not some sort of trick by the other side to get information on us, but I don’t trust it. I’m deleting it.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible.
